title: Hey Sion, why didn't you help us?

replies.body:
**Enemy:** Lol Sion, ran into a dead turret & shit.
**Ally:** So..."somebody" huh?
Joke's on you, it was full AD Sion.

fucking ziggs man
5 times the kills of everyone else on his team combined

> [{quoted}](name=Giovarco,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t4shP2mn,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-12T17:10:21.458+0000)
>
> Boooom!
> 
> http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll36/Bigsteve87/Gifs/AtomicBomb.gif

Yeah that's what I was thinking when I saw that. Not sure why people keep talking about Sion.
Well, it was obviously a custom game, and I imagine the purpose of it might have been "Get Sion as much health as possible and see if he can 1v5." Also, bots.

I know that :P

I more meant how long was that game if he got 93 kills lol. I would NOT have the patience for that

There's people who spent hours and hours to get "records" in this game. For example, the thousands of Nasus clips of dealing over 10k - 100k damage. CS clips where players spend the first 20 minutes or so just farming to get 500+ CS and just reap the upvotes. 

You'd be amazed at the things people have spent their precious time on this game.

I wasn't trying to get health records. I just wanted to show that a true hypercarry doesn't just have 100% crit, but also 5000 health. Only way to be...

I was fortunate enough to land RIGHT on 5000 after the last kill. Perfect screenshot.
52 minutes and 40 seconds, says right there in the screenshot :)
